prompts: Create an elegant ice-type Pokemon with shimmering wings and a graceful body.
I want a Pokemon that blends into snowy environments with white and blue colors.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a moth, with intricate patterns on its wings.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that has the ability to freeze its enemies in battle.
Imagine a creature that thrives in cold habitats and has a serene personality.
Design a Pokemon with butterfly-like features and a majestic appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that can glide gracefully through icy forests.
